body: This guy dropped one doujin and dip out lmao
Finally I found the whole story!
Gian IS a douche but I never liked Nobita either. Hes overly dependent on Doraemon and is basically just a whiney little bitch so he can get cucked for all I care. Suneo is best boy.
fuck man why am I salty over a damn doujin
since we know what nobita will become later in his life, i think we can agree that shizuka really took a bullet and give it a head instead. well good luck living a happy life with that muscle head.

This is the kind of NTR i like, the "softcore NTR" as i called it, where you don't feel that much of a guilt because the boyfriend is not a good boyfriend. I also never expected to read a doraemon hentai of the friends in this way, it's so different that it felt like a whole new manga
the art is very good. the girl should have just broken up instead of cheating but the bf deserves it so meh
That was pretty cool
Never expected to read a fucking doraemon ntr but it's totally nuts ngl
Be like Nobita, but dont forget to throw away your girlfriend very soon
Not a big fan of NTR but, this type of NTR I can get behind, bf was an asshole and deserved to get his gf taken. Don't be like Nobita, appreciate what you got, or be prepared to lose it.
I'm not the ntr type but nobita is the one at fault here.

Welp.. I'll just think of this as an original work. The Art's good tho
The real Doraemon Movie ending

I dunno how to feel on one hand it's kinda justified cause Nobita out right takes her for granted and only apologizes when he's lonely where as Taksehi does seem to genuienly hold affection for her, sure fucking him whiles till with Nobita was bad but after going on and off into highschool can you really call it a relationship anymore? I think Nobita needs the reality check of his girl leaving him for him to realize his faults and then move on, same goes for shizuka and Takeshi so that everyone isn't caught up.
I was bewildered for seconds over this

ayo wtf doraemon ?
@tobajas its hentai logic none of it needs to make sense

Art is so good that you can hardly make any type of semblance and can't even relate to the kid's series (only the texts say so) but to treat this as an entirely new story. If you read this without the texts and just see the pictures, you wouldn't even know this is a parody of Doraemon. 10th reupload and counting! (@tobajas said it right, scroll down)

On a side note I have no idea how in stories in general one part just get's to say stuff like just be my gf for a month, if you lose your gf is mine or what not but they never ever offer anything in return and ppl just accept it like it's normal. Would love to live in these worlds (I know their imaginary) where I could just go up to a random person and say hey let's arm wrestle if you lose everything you own becomes mine!
Generic, but the art is good. It's not too stupidly exaggerated either. Like, there's no over the top bullshit nonsense included. Pretty good.

Well when I check the artist this has been reuploaded 10 times in the last 4 years xD I think the problem is a bit how nhentai works with uploading from my understanding they kinda automatically upload stuff from e-hentai so as long as someone reposts stuff on there it get's reuploaded on here.

surprise to not see this after 10th reupload, not really upset the guy truly loves her and didn't make her his sex slave with big dick energy, he pretty much wants her as his own wife, would be nice a sequel of this of the girl cutting all ties with the bf since he looks like she wants to dump him
